review_data.title: Pricey but perfect pretzels

review_data.title: Bad service

review_data.title: Déçue

review_data.title: Amazing!
review_data.content: Incredible choice to grab something of quality in a train station. Endless pretzel/brezel items. The gentleman behind the counter directed us to the best baked goods while steering us away from non-favorite with some dry humor. My favorite brezel was the Jalapeno Cheese Bacon ....Swiss...More

review_data.title: Quite good
review_data.content: Quite a delicious bagel - won’t blow your mind, but is enjoyable. Worth a try if you’re in Zurich. There is one close to Zurich HB station.

review_data.title: 気軽にプレッツェル
review_data.content: 結構売店で買うと高いですが、こちらのお店は安いです。焼きたてが購入できます。大きいので二人でシェアするくらいでちょうど良...More

review_data.title: Snack
review_data.content: This Swiss chain is a local Swiss favorite...they sell two things: Pretzels and Sausages. You can get a plain pretzel for $2, a cheesy Raclette pretzel for $3.50(YUM!), a pretzel sandwich for about $7, or a sausage in pretzel bun for $5.50-6.50...get the rauchwurst in...More

review_data.title: Pretzel
review_data.content: Great flavors of pretzel. Soft and easy to chew. Enjoyed the buttered pretzels- lots of butter. Raclette has melted cheese on top. Multiple locations near train stations in Zurich and Lucerne.

review_data.title: Convenient, quick and decent quality.
review_data.content: For a fast food outlet the quality of the pretzels in the majority of stores is very good. I found most of the time they were fresh, especially in busier locations (although I have had the occasional stale filled one) and prices are comparatively reasonable,...More

review_data.title: Ich LIEBE Sie
review_data.content: Das unterirdische Einkaufszentrum Brezelkonig in Zürich an der Hauptstrecke ist genau der Ort für ein schnelles lecker Brezel oder Sandwich!...More

review_data.title: Big fan of king Brezel
review_data.content: They have an outlet next my platform and I have to resist. Indulging. They have a good variety of Brezels and sandwiches. My favorites are Kürbis and Tuna fish. Service is quick and the stuff is nearly always freshly cooked and warm.

review_data.title: Un profumo irresistibile
review_data.content: Siamo stati una settimana aclugano e ogni mattina e pomeriggio passavamo dalla stazione ferroviaria appositamente per acquistare quei favolosi pretzel.li...More

review_data.title: Great selection, great quality
review_data.content: Very good quality. King of bretzels. Also outside of Globus department store. Taste all of them. Take some home with you. A great souvenir from Zurich.

review_data.title: Pretzel god or goddess?
review_data.content: The service is like a nice high-speed train. A lot of various quality pretzels available. Prices are good. Thank you and a good journey to everyone and do not miss your train or plane or whatever....

review_data.title: quality pretzels
review_data.content: We had a few hours in Zurich during a flight stopover and ran around the city. We looked up the best pretzels in Zurich and this place was top of the list. They did not disappoint. The sandwich pretzels were more expensive but so filling!...More

review_data.title: Wer Brezeln mag, mag den Brezelkönig

review_data.title: Monster Brezel and Co.

review_data.title: Something to look forward when in Zurich
review_data.content: Their kürbiskern brezel is all I want in life! I get three and they are gone before boarding (at the airport location). I'm so glad they are not in my home city or I would weigh 500 pounds.

review_data.title: Super und freundlich
review_data.content: Zum Mittag hatte ich kaum Zeit. Darum war der Brezelkönig genau richtig für das Mittag zwischen durch.

review_data.title: Buono ma spiegate bene gli ingredienti dei panini
review_data.content: Locale molto invitante e brezel ottimi. Ci sono rimasta male perché avevo chiesto un panino al salame di quelli esposti...More

review_data.title: Everyone needs a bagel
review_data.content: A visit to Switzerland would not be complete without a bagel from here. Anytime of the day , freshly made and very tasty. The problem is too much choice!

review_data.title: Cibo di strada della tradizione svizzera

review_data.title: Solid Quality
review_data.content: Bretzellovers find a home in any of the Bretzelkönig’s in Zurich because they serve their Bretzels accurately prepared to company standards, are very priceworthy and tasty, European fast food at it’s best; all of their staff seem to be friendly and motivated. The Bretzelkönig in...More

review_data.title: Good fast food
review_data.content: Standup snack bar serves various varieties of brezel plus coffee and soft drinks.Not inexpensive but good value for tasty takeaway snacks.Ham prezel is particularly tasty...

review_data.title: Staffs seem to enjoy there jobs are attentive
review_data.content: For the Brezel enthusiast and the lover of good Sandwiches almost all Brezelkonig including this one have been tops if maybe a bit on the pricey side.

review_data.title: Il ministro caffè al mattino

review_data.title: Almost as Good as an Octoberfest Pretzel
review_data.content: We were on the go and these pretzels looked delicious. We got a plain one with salt and a pepperoni pretzel. We were not disappointed.

review_data.title: Perfect breakfast
review_data.content: I had a pretzel with ham for my grab and go breakfast, it is a perfect meal for me for a busy morning. Crispy crust with chewy texture inside and the creaminess from butter and slight saltiness from ham gave this pretzel a round taste

review_data.title: SOFT Pretzels at HIGH prices!

review_data.title: fast food in German. Like a Swedish Fralla, but on soft pretzels
review_data.content: I have often eaten at this chain. The service is FAST even when there is a long queue. The soft pretzel sandwiches are good and - when you've eaten there often - predictable. This is not a culinary experience, but reliable sandwiches and coffee. Or...More

review_data.title: Pour un repas sur le pouce

review_data.title: Tasty treats
review_data.content: Conveniently located at the Zurich HBF, Brezelkonig provided tasty pretzels and sandwiches to the whole family. Breads are freshly prepared, many varieties of sandwiches such as Kasse(cheese), ham and salami were real treat to the taste buds

review_data.title: Tasty Pretzel Eatery
review_data.content: Brezelkonig in the underground shopping centre at the Hauptbahnhoff Zurich is just the place for a quick tasty brezel or sandwich! The range and variety of pretzels or brezels as they are called here is good, and the taste even better. Moreover, the brezels are...More

review_data.title: Always a good snack option
review_data.content: The Brezelkonig at the lower level of the main train station offers a nice selection of quick and grab to go treats. Their prices are reasonable and the food is freshly baked. The staff was efficient, but not the most friendly. There is usually a...More

review_data.title: Tappa obbligatoria

review_data.title: Frühstück / Lunch

review_data.title: Molto buono per pausa veloce
review_data.content: Molto bene per pausa veloce. Pretzel ripieno fresco e saporito. Anche possibilità di tramezzini. Personale cordiale. Consigliato!!!!

review_data.title: Auf dem abfallenden Ast

review_data.title: Best Pretzel Sandwiches
review_data.content: I don't know why we do not have these in the U.S. The pretzels are delicious, a little hard on the outside and soft on the inside. Best of all the cut them in half and make delicious sandwiches out of them, such as ham...More

review_data.title: good for snacking
review_data.content: located in central station underground shopping area.good for fast takeaway snacks;quite tasty,quite expensive but works fine.

review_data.title: Favorite place to eat at during the 4 day trip
review_data.content: The sandwiches are beautifully simple and tasty. i believe in our 4 day trip, I ate there 5 times. Have to admit that I miss it.... especially the salami sandwich ...

review_data.title: Pretzel fantastici!
review_data.content: Buonissimi pretzel, da provare quello ai semi di zucca e il raclette! Tappa consigliata a Zurigo. Adatto per uno spuntino...More

review_data.title: the very best Brezel
review_data.content: Brezelkonig is the very best brezel in Zurich. The taste is so good that you want more and more from it. You can have it with seeds or regular.

review_data.title: Best Brezel in town
review_data.content: I have had their Brezel for at least 10 years and they are always as amazing as the first day I tried them. The sunflower seed Brezel being my all time favorite. They have several locations in town (downtown Bahnhofstrasse, train station, Oerlikon, Bellevue) which...More

review_data.title: Qualcosa di spettacolare!
review_data.content: C'è poco da dire per tutti gli amanti e non dei brezel non posso che dire di passare obbligatoriamente da...More

review_data.title: Quite like it for Baguette on the go
review_data.content: I often just want to grab a baguette sandwich for on the go. Brezelkönig is great for this. Best brezel in town (so I hear from Germans living in Zürich).

review_data.title: Best Pretzel in Switzerland
review_data.content: When in Switzerland make sure to try Brezelkonig. Their pretzels were utterly delicious esp our favorite was the "cheese pretzel" and you can easily find them in Zurich airport and train station. Enjoy when you are in Switzerland.

review_data.title: Best pretzel in Zurich
review_data.content: Buy a pretzel here. They are the best we had in our travels in Switzerland (and we bought a lot of pretzels). This stand on the main floor of the train station at the Zurich airport could easily be overlooked. We liked the raclette and...More

review_data.title: Great for a pick me up snack or a meal
review_data.content: Large variety of yummy pretzels available whether you just want a snack or make meal from a pretzel sandwich. Had a pretzel "sandwich" with cheese. It was just the thing after an afternoon of sightseeing before heading back to the hotel. Price was reasonable considering...More

review_data.title: Yummy

review_data.title: Immer wieder gut
review_data.content: Der Brezelkönig bietet verschiedenste Sandwiches, Brezel und Hot Dogs an. Diese schmecken sehr gut und sind frisch. Meist sind die...More

review_data.title: "Die Besten Bretzeln hat der Bretzelkönig"
review_data.content: Waren auf der Durchreise und hatten ein wenig Hunger.was gibt es da besseres als der Bretzelkönig. Die besten Bretzeln überhaupt!!

review_data.title: impressive brezel
review_data.content: CHF 6,80 for a proper meal is impossible in switzerland, but it is good enough to get some nice brezels here in Brezelkonig! recommend!

review_data.title: Ich mag die Brezel vom Brezelkönig
review_data.content: Die Hot Dogs sind sehr lecker aber besonders gerne mag ich die Butterbrezel. Cafe to gibt es auch noch!

review_data.title: Delivers a good sandwich!
review_data.content: Nothing out of the ordinary here, but Brezelkonig provide flavourful fresh sandwiches that taste good and have high quality ingredients. My favourite was cheese and tomato baguette.

review_data.title: Best Butter Bretzel!
review_data.content: Bretzels can be had anytime of the day, though I prefer it towards the end of an evening. This is my regular spot for an evening snack and I recommend butter bretzel and cheese bretzel, specially for those who are looking at veggie options. If...More

review_data.title: I love Brezelkonig!
review_data.content: So to others this may be a sandwich/pretzel stand but to me it's my go-to place every time I travel through the Zurich airport. I get a hot dog pretzel and it is literally my favorite thing. It's so delicious but so simple. They create...More

review_data.title: The best Brezel I ever head

review_data.title: The Best Brezel in the world
review_data.content: I cannot pass by any of the Brezelkonig kiosk without buying one Brezel They have various flavors. I prefer the one with the seeds.. You must try it! It is definitely one of Zurich culinary attractions

review_data.title: Gut für einen schnellen Hot Dog
review_data.content: Ich denke dieser Stand lebt vom Hot Dog...... dieser ist gut und schnell... die Getränke sind um näheren Umfeld(Shop etc.)...More

review_data.title: Pretzels of all kinds
review_data.content: Pretzels are really popular here and there are these kiosks all over Zurich. They have many varieties including natural (plain), with pumpkin seeds, cinnamon, etc. Another specialty is they slice the pretzel to make sandwiches: ham and cheese, caprese, etc. They sell a lot of...More
